tool.name: Paired-end histogram
tool.command: ln -s '${input_bam}' localbam.bam && ln -f -s '${input_bam.metadata.bam_index}' localbam.bam.bai && java -jar '$__tool_directory__/PEHistogram.jar' -B localbam.bam -I localbam.bam.bai #if str($lower_limit): -l $lower_limit #end if #if str($upper_limit): -u $upper_limit #end if -p '$output1' -t '$output2' 1>/dev/null

param.name: lower_limit
param.label: Lower bp limit (optional)
param.help: The lower bp limit on insert size for calculating the histogram.

param.name: upper_limit
param.label: Upper bp limit (optional)
param.help: The upper bp limit on insert size for calculating the histogram.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Produces an insert size histogram and basic statistics for a paired-end BAM file. Two outputs are produced:
- a png image consisting of the histogram of the insert size frequency - a tabular file containing the alignment statistics
-----
**Options**
* **Lower bp limit** - the lower bp limit on insert size for calculating the histogram. * **Upper bp limit** - the upper bp limit on insert size for calculating the histogram.
